definition.description: Stores all notices. Security rules will control visibility based on user role and notice 'role' field.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to securely manage users and notices for the Vidyalaya Connect application, prioritizing authorization independence and clear security rules. User data is stored in a dedicated collection (`/users/{userId}`) with path-based ownership, ensuring only the user can access their own data. Notices are stored in a top-level `notices` collection for easy querying across the app. Security rules will filter notices based on the logged-in user's role and the `role` property on the notice document itself, ensuring users only see relevant announcements.
